pullRequest.title: Fix #2181 Handle nulls from collectors in Flux.collect()
pullRequest.bodyText: Emit an NPE early instead of signaling onNext(null).

commit.message:
Fix #2181 Handle nulls from collectors in Flux.collect()

Emit an NPE early instead of signaling onNext(null).

+package reactor.core.publisher;
+
+import java.util.stream.Collector;
+
+import org.junit.Test;
+import reactor.test.StepVerifier;
+
+import static java.util.stream.Collectors.reducing;
+
+/**
+ * Tests for {@link Flux#collect(Collector)}.
+ *
+ * @author Eric Bottard
+ */
+public class FluxCollectTest {
